titles.title: Providing for an adjournment or recess of the two Houses.
Providing for an adjournment or recess of the two Houses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 376 - 40 (Roll no. 457).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from July 25 or 26, 2003, until September 3, 2003, and a recess or an adjournment of the Senate from any day on July 25 through August 4, 2003, until September 2, 2003.
